content.rendered: The infographic points out 6 major steps towards accomplishing the small business SEO checklist, which will help each business understand what they lack or what they require in order to gain traffic.

excerpt.rendered: The infographic points out 6 major steps towards accomplishing the small business SEO checklist, which will help each business understand what they lack or what they require in order to gain traffic.
